          <title>
            <string language="en">Suitcase full of gold.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Koffer voll Gold.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Valise complètement d'or.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Suitcase completamente do ouro.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suitcase in pieno di oro.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνολο βαλιτσών του χρυσού.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Maleta por completo de oro.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This cartoon shows that a suitcase full of air is a lot lighter than one full of gold.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">suitcase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karikatur zeigt, daß ein Koffer voll Luft viel 
heller als einer voll von Gold ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce dessin animé prouve qu'une valise complètement d'air 
est beaucoup plus légère que celle complètement d'or.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este cartoon mostra que um suitcase completamente do ar é
muito mais claro do que um completamente do ouro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo fumetto indica che un suitcase in pieno di aria è 
mólto più chiaro di uno in pieno di oro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα κινούμενα σχέδια δείχνουν ότι ένα σύνολο 
βαλιτσών του αέρα είναι πολύ ελαφρύτερο από ένα σύνολο του 
χρυσού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta historieta muestra que una maleta de aire es por 
completo mucho más ligera que una por completo de oro.</string>
          </description>
